item.description: Presentations 2019 Giorgio Di Tizio, Fabio Massacci. "Estimating cyber risk from experiments with cyber ranges and CTFs". 2019 SRA Annual Meeting, Arlington (Virginia, USA) Posters 2019 Giorgio Di Tizio, Fabio Massacci, Luca Allodi, Stanislav Dashevskyi, Jelena Mirkovic. "Cyber Security Risk as an Experimental Discipline: a Proposal Building upon Capture the Flags". Poster Session EuroS&Pâ€™19, 4th IEEE European Symposium on Security and Privacy, Stockholm (Sweden) Giorgio Di Tizio, Fabio Massacci, Luca Allodi, Stanislav Dashevskyi, Jelena Mirkovic.
